prompt: Session Host Installation Wizard should not be left unattended
Session Host Error 'Appropriate .Net application pool in the IIS (NOT FOUND)'
completion:
The error is displayed while installing Accops HyWorks Management
Console, though .Net 4.5 has been installed and ASP.Net is enabled in
Windows Server 2008 R2 machine.

prompt: Session Host Error Service could not be started during installation
completion:
Sometimes when the server where HyWorks Controller/ Session Host servers
are being installed, is not having enough resources, HyWorks services
might fail to restart and during installation it will show the error and
will wait for user input.

prompt: Session Host Controller Installation on Microsoft WVD
completion: Installation of HyWorks Controller on Microsoft WVD will require some additional configurations.

prompt: Session Host Resolving Dot Net Installation Issue on Windows 2008 R2-SP1
completion:
HyWorks Controller installation requires dot net 4.7.2 or later installed on Windows servers. Windows 2008R2-SP1 supports installation of .Net 4.7.2. 
In this section, steps to resolve a dot net installation issue on 2008 R2-SP1 will be provided.
